string-array.name: info_data_array
string-array.item: Clerodendrum inerme, is valued in traditional medicine for treating various ailments including fever, skin diseases, and respiratory issues due to its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties.
Elephantopus scaber, is esteemed in traditional medicine for its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties, utilized to treat respiratory ailments, skin disorders, and digestive issues.
Alternanthera sessilis, is esteemed in traditional medicine for its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, utilized to alleviate conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, and liver disorders.
Artocarpus heterophyllus, yields medicinal extracts used in traditional Ayurvedic practices, offering remedies for ailments like diabetes and digestive issues.
Centella asiatica, is revered in traditional medicine for its cognitive-enhancing and wound-healing properties, used to improve memory, reduce anxiety, and promote skin regeneration.
